categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic squads

nodes.text: "Storm Unit" was likely the name of a squad of Rebel Alliance boarding troopers during the Galactic Civil War.

The "Storm Unit" was called upon numerous times during the war to board enemy vessels and installations, their mission profiles included: stealing information; planting explosives; rescuing prisoners and capturing certain facilities.
"Storm Unit" would also appear to have been made up of different squads. One such squad was commanded by Lieutenant Paling, who led the Nighthawks.
Some of their high profile missions included:
